snippet: Sam Mikulak of Michigan won his third all-around title, and the host Wolverines successfully defended their N.C.A.A. men’s gymnastics team title.
abstract: Gymnast Sam Mikulak of Michigan wins his third all-around title, as his team successfully defends their NCAA men’s gymnastics team title.
lead_paragraph: Sam Mikulak of Michigan won his third all-around title, and the host Wolverines successfully defended their N.C.A.A. men’s gymnastics team title.

headline.main: Michigan Is Champion Again in Men’s Gymnastics
